00013 class mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder : public mfpf_point_finder_builder

00015  private:
00016   //: Kernel reference point (in kni_ x knj_ grid)
00017   double ref_x_;
00018   //: Kernel reference point (in kni_ x knj_ grid)

00020 
00021   //: Kernel mask is ni_ x nj_

00023   //: Kernel mask is ni_ x nj_

00030   double dA_;

00033   //  If 0.5, then overlap requires pt inside central 50% of region.
